data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Parks are ideal for free or low-cost physical activities, for all ages and fitness levels. It's recommended that people do at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity each week, which will help control weight and keep fit. Walking is a free and easy way to get active, lose weight and improve heart health. Local parks surrounded by flowers, trees, and birdsong are great places to walk and jog. Running with others can be motivating while going it alone can be a chance to clear one's mind. Besides, a growing number of parks and green spaces have free-to-use gym equipment like pull-up bars, step-ups, static bikes, and parallel bars. This readily accessible equipment encourages people to exercise on a more regular basis, which is good. (125字)
data.referenceText: Talk about things people can do in a park.
data.referenceTranslate: 谈论人们可以在公园里做的事情。
